website_summaries.verdict: This model delivers a solid performance for its astonishingly low price point.
pros: Includes a wide assortment of accessories, including a camera
Very good sound quality for a budget model
Holds tune for several days at a time
Ready to play right out of the box
cons: Fingerboard may not be straight, causing major performance issues

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Gift
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my little sister. I think she likes it, though she's too busy playing computer games or the PS3 to learn the violin. I'm the same way with the guitar though.
customer_reviews.author: P.D.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his violin.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son completely loves his Violin as well as the go camera! The bow was a little cheaply made, but overall great products.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Her music teacher suggest us to return the violin due to poor quality. The fingerboard is not straight cause the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this violin for my daughter. Her music teacher suggest us to return the violin due to poor quality. The fingerboard is not straight cause the violin unplayable. Have to return the violin.
customer_reviews.author: Jilian H

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I think it is a functional violin. The little niece hasn't turned on to it yet but I have faith. The camera is very helpful in showing her what her finger technique needs to adjust. She is starting to warm up to it. I think it will provide us with entertainment for some time to come. All in all a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Reita Easley

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!  Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Received my violin today. Opened it and everything was in great shape. It tuned very easily and has a great tone! Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a beginner's violin. My husband is really enjoying this addition to his collection of instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good experience all around
customer_reviews.text: Good experience all around. My order arrived about a week earlier than promised. It had everything I needed to play.
customer_reviews.author: David Chambers

customer_reviews.title: bad finish, bridges carved wrong way
customer_reviews.text: Purchased total of 4 Kaizer violins, but all of them have issues: bad finish, bridges carved wrong way. I ended up returning all 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Violin was very nicely crafted. Sound quality is very nice as well
customer_reviews.text: Violin was very nicely crafted. Sound quality is very nice as well. The camera quality is very good. Unbeatable deal!
customer_reviews.author: Shrimpai

customer_reviews.title: Priced Right For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This violin was purchased as a Christmas gift for my husband and he absolutely loved it. He was wanting to learn how to play and this violin is perfect for beginners. It is affordable and it came with a case which was a huge plus. The camera that came with the violin is fantastic and sealed the deal when trying to decide between this violin and others. I am very happy with this purchase and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice violin. My son takes violin lessons and he ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice violin. My son takes violin lessons and he is happy to get this. I must say that this is a beginners instrument but for a violin at this price I can't get better deal than that. It's very well made and comes with all accessories plus more. It came with a small action camera too which we haven't explored completely yet but looks so fun. We were having issue at first with bow but seller helped and explained that rosin needed to be scratched before first use and it did work. Overall a really good instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kaizer VLN-1000 Reliable Student Violin 1000 Series Standard 4/4 Size Varnished Finish with Included Action Camera & Accessories
product_meta.description: Reliability and everything else the Kaizer 1000 series violin is built to be, reliable and practical. Intended specifically for beginners, it will meet all of a student musician. Whether you’re in school orchestra, or with a private instructor, the 1000 series is highly capable and versatile. It is as elegant as it is practical. This violin package includes all essential accessories and can be set up and played within minutes. The 1000 series student instruments introduces high functionality, excellent playability, and reliability to students/beginners at a practical price point. Available in multiple options of colors and finishes to meet the unique and various need of the players. Kaizer offers you the most reliable product and service your money can buy. Kaizer products comes from factories that produces reliable products for many other leading brands. We seek out original manufactures that produces quality instruments for popular brands, we put our private label on those same instruments, stripping away distributors, middle-men, dealers, sales people, gimmick and non-sense, leaving you with top quality and incredible value. Then we top it off with an unbeatable warranty offering you a peace of mind that is unparalleled. Features and specs: Tone-wood grade spruce top, tone-wood grade maple back and sides, maple fingerboard and pegs, chin-rest, durable lightweight aluminum alloy tailpiece, standard medium tension steel core strings, brazil wood and genuine bleached Mongolian horsehair bow, molded hard case (with straps) offering maximum protection during transport and storage, foam padded ABS shoulder-rest. Included accessories: Molded hard case. ABS shoulder-rest. Brazil wood bow, all-natural rosin. Limited time offer: Includes 720hd action camera.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars14 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
